services.title: Comprehensive Tech Solutions
services.subtitle: From concept to deployment, we deliver excellence across the entire tech stack.

mobileDev.title: Mobile Apps
mobileDev.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications delivering exceptional user experiences on iOS and Android.

security.title: Cybersecurity

ai.title: AI Solutions

whyUs.title: Why Choose NovaArab?
whyUs.subtitle: Industry-leading technology with uncompromising quality and support.

hero.title: About NovaArab
hero.subtitle: We are a team of innovators, developers, and strategists dedicated to building the future of technology in the Arab world and beyond.

founder.name: Hassan
founder.title: CEO at NovaArab
founder.bio1: As Founder and CEO of NovaArab, I lead a clear vision: empowering businesses in the Arab world through innovative and advanced technical solutions.
founder.bio2: We believe digital transformation is not just a luxury, but a strategic necessity. Through our dedicated team and commitment to excellence, we help our clients achieve their digital goals.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between traditional business and modern technology, NovaArab has grown to become a key technology partner for companies in the region.
story.p2: We believe in the power of digital transformation to solve complex problems and create new opportunities. Our journey is defined by a relentless pursuit of excellence and commitment to client success.

values.title: What Drives Us
values.subtitle: Our mission, vision, and values guide everything we do

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with innovative tech solutions that drive sustainable growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage in the digital age.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading technology partner in the Middle East, globally recognized for quality, integrity, and transformative digital solutions.

core.title: Our Values
core.description: Customer focus, technical excellence, transparency, continuous learning, and ethical practices define who we are and guide every decision.

passion.title: Passion Drives Us
passion.description: We love what we do and it shows in every line of code and every client interaction.

excellence.title: Tech Excellence
excellence.description: We stay at the forefront of technology, constantly learning and adapting to new tools and methodologies.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We challenge the status quo and seek creative solutions to complex problems.

quality.title: Quality Obsession
quality.description: We take pride in delivering work that exceeds expectations and stands the test of time.

timeline.title: Our Path
timeline.subtitle: Milestones that shaped who we are today

y2019.title: Company Founded
y2019.desc: NovaArab founded with a mission to bridge the tech gap in the Middle East.

y2020.title: First Major Project
y2020.desc: Delivered our first enterprise solution, setting our standard for quality and innovation.

y2021.title: Team Expansion
y2021.desc: Team grew to over 20 specialists covering all aspects of modern software development.

y2022.title: International Recognition
y2022.desc: Received industry awards and established partnerships with global tech leaders.

y2023.title: AI Integration
y2023.desc: Launched AI & ML division, helping clients leverage cutting-edge technology.

y2024.title: Continued Growth
y2024.desc: 500+ successful projects, expanding services and maintaining 98% client satisfaction.

cta.title: Ready to Work Together?
cta.description: Join hundreds of companies trusting us with their most critical tech projects.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Join 20+ companies trusting NovaArab to build their digital future.

footer.description: Empowering businesses with cutting-edge digital solutions. From custom software to mobile apps, we're building the future of technology in the Arab world.
